# 1954 Rutgers Queensmen football team

The 1954 Rutgers Queensmen football team represented Rutgers University in the 1954 college football season. In their 13th season under head coach Harvey Harman, the Queensmen compiled a 3â€“6 record and were outscored by their opponents 145 to 140.
